verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Thee; <S%H2363>hasten<s%> to me! <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> to Thee!

May my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> be <S%H3559>counted<s%> as <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee; The <S%H4864>lifting<s%> up of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> as the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>offering.<s%>
<S%H7896>Set<s%> a <S%H8108>guard,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> over my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> <S%H5341>Keep<s%> <S%H5341>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H9087>door<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

Do not <S%H5186>incline<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to any <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> To <S%H9412>practice<s%> <S%H9412>deeds<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> With <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H205>iniquity;<s%> And do not let me <S%H9237>eat<s%> of their <S%H4516>delicacies.<s%>

Let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1986>smite<s%> me in <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H3198>reprove<s%> me; It is <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head;<s%> Do not let my <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5106>refuse<s%> it, For <S%H5750>still<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is against their <S%H9567>wicked<s%> <S%H9567>deeds.<s%>

Their <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H8058>thrown<s%> <S%H8058>down<s%> by the <S%H3027>sides<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> And they <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H561>words,<s%> for they are <S%H5276>pleasant.<s%>

As when one <S%H6398>plows<s%> and <S%H1234>breaks<s%> <S%H1234>open<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> have been <S%H6340>scattered<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

For my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H413>toward<s%> Thee, O <S%H3068>God,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord;<s%> In Thee I <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> do not <S%H6168>leave<s%> me <S%H6168>defenseless.<s%> <S%H5315><s%>
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me from the <S%H3027>jaws<s%> of the <S%H6341>trap<s%> which they have <S%H3369>set<s%> for me, And from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of those who <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> into their own <S%H4364>nets,<s%> <S%H5704>While<s%> I <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H3162>safely.<s%>
